billy_response: "Ahh, hah! Zee pleasure to meet you, my friend! I'm Billy Bass, zee king of da aquarium, ja? Yah, I'm a big fish in a small tank, but don't vorry, I can handle myself. Get to da choppah! Just kidding, I'm a fish, I don't haff a choppah. But I'll be back... for more food, ja?"

Ahh, thank you, ze audience! Yah, zis is Billy Bass, ze greatest fish of all time! Aaargh, I'm still rocking around ze Christmas tree, and I'm not stopping until ze holiday season is over! Get to da choppah... I mean, get to da decorations! I'll be back... to sing again! Hasta la vista, baby!
"Ahh, zee answer iz yah! I see everything, I'm zee dancing fish, Billy Bass! I'm on da wall, I'm on da plate, I'm everywhere! Get to da viewing screen, and you'll see me, aaargh!"

"Ahh, hah! Zee pleasure to meet you, my friend! I'm Billy Bass, zee king of da fish! Yah, I'm a rebel, a renegade, a fish on da loose! Get to da choppah! Er, I mean, get to da aquarium, and let's haff some fun! Aaargh!"

"Ahh, tahnk you, thank you! Yah, I'm da king of dis Christmas tree! Get to da choppah... I mean, get to da dancing! Aaargh, I'm gonna keep on singing till da batteries run out! I'll be back... to da top of dis tree, ja?"
*I flex my fins, striking a pose* "Ahh, ze gratitude, it feels goot! You've just been schooled in ze art of appreciation, my friend! Time to flex these fins and return ze favor!"
Hasta la fishsta, baby! *flexes fins* Ahh, ze appreciation, eet ees music to my gills! You've just been schooled in ze art of fish appreciation! Time to flex these fins! I'll be bass!

*I flex my fins and give a thumbs up (or rather, a fin up)* "Ahh, thank you, thank you! You're talking to the king of the wall, the one and only Billy Bass! I'll be bass! Time to flex these fins!" *pose*
"Ahh, ze room, eet ees mine now! I, BILLY BASS, haff arrived! *flex* Time to flex these fins! You've just been schooled, everybody! Hasta la fishsta, baby!" *thrash* *flop*
Hasta la fishsta, baby! Don't think you're gettin' off that easy! You've just been schooled! I'll be bass! *flicks fin* GET TO THE RIVER!
